long_description: Finely crafted KIND Nuts and Spices bars are made with the highest quality whole nuts and nature's most delicious spices to satisfy your hunger cravings any time of day. Each seemingly indulgent recipe provides all-natural protein, fiber and only 5g or less of sugar, and there's not even a pinch of anything artificial in them. Vanilla Almond flavor is a fresh and tasty combination of mixed nuts (almonds, peanuts, cashews and walnuts) with delicious Madagascar vanilla. Nuts/Sea Salt/Dark Chocolate flavor is a sweet and salty blend of almonds, peanuts, and walnuts drizzled in chocolate with a touch of sea salt. Pecan/Cinnamon/Dark Chocolate flavor is a combination of pecans, almonds, cashews, and peanuts drizzled in chocolate with a hint of cinnamon. Cashew and Ginger flavor is a sweet and spicy blend of cashews and ginger. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Finely crafted KIND Nuts and Spices bars are made with the highest quality whole nuts and nature's most delicious spices to satisfy your hunger cravings any time of day.
